long_description: Paddle all day in comfort--this seat fastens to most cane canoe seats, providing back support for more comfortable paddling. Convenient straps with quick-release buckles make attaching seat to canoe quick and easy. Made from rugged, water-resistant coated ripstop nylon with 1.5-inches closed-cell foam seat and 0.5-inch closed-cell foam back. Carbon fiber stays provide firm support. Nylon side straps with quick-release buckles adjust your sitting position. Folds easy for storage; hook-and-loop closure strap holds chair closed while portaging. Once you've reached your destination, it does double-duty as a relaxing camp chair. Mesh accessory pocket on back of seat stows small items. Folded Dimensions: 13 x 15.5 x 2 inches; chair height: 13 inches.
short_description: Paddle all day in comfort--this seat fastens to most cane canoe seats, providing back support for more comfortable paddling.
